text: About Last Night is a 2014 American romantic comedy movie. It is a remake of the 1986 movie of the same name. It is about romantic encounters in Los Angeles. Paula Patton is in the cast. The original movie was set in Chicago. This one is set in Los Angeles and has an all-black cast The remake was released in mid February of 2014. It was rated R. The original romance movie was also rated R. == Other websites == * Category:2014 romantic comedy movies Category:American movie remakes Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: About Last Night (2014 movie)
